comments.ads_enabled: Master switch - turns off ALL ads (interstitial, banners, choice dialogs) if false
comments.show_ad_on_share: Show ad when user shares drawing (set false for better viral growth)
comments.show_ad_on_close: Show ad when user closes drawing
comments.ad_choice_max_times: How many times to show choice dialog (set to 0 to skip dialog entirely)
comments.min_drawing_time_seconds: Minimum drawing time before showing ads (release builds)
comments.min_drawing_time_debug_seconds: Minimum drawing time for debug builds (easier testing)
